Package org.example.ec_central.service

Class TaxiService

java.lang.Object
org.example.ec_central.service.TaxiService
@Service public class TaxiService extends Object
Service class for handling taxi-related operations.

    • TaxiService

      public TaxiService(TaxiRepository taxiRepository)
      Constructs a new TaxiService with the specified repository.
      Parameters:
      taxiRepository - the repository for managing taxi entities

  • Method Details

    • assignAvailableTaxi

      public Optional<Taxi> assignAvailableTaxi(int x, int y)
      Assigns an available taxi to the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate to assign the taxi to
      y - the y-coordinate to assign the taxi to
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the assigned Taxi if available, otherwise an empty Optional

    • findAllAvailableTaxis

      public List<Taxi> findAllAvailableTaxis()
      Retrieves all available taxis.
      Returns:
      a list of available taxis

    • releaseTaxi

      public void releaseTaxi(Taxi taxi)
      Releases a taxi, making it available for assignment.
      Parameters:
      taxi - the taxi to be released

    • findTaxiByIdentifier

      public Optional<Taxi> findTaxiByIdentifier(String identifier)
      Finds a taxi by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      identifier - the identifier of the taxi
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the Taxi if found, otherwise an empty Optional

    • updateTaxiLocationByIdentifier

      public void updateTaxiLocationByIdentifier(TaxiStatusDto taxiStatusDto)
      Updates the location and status of a taxi based on the provided TaxiStatusDto.
      Parameters:
      taxiStatusDto - the data transfer object containing the taxi status and location information
